channel.title: Posts on Sungura
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Sungura

item.title: Motion graphics 2D
item.description: Animations designed for a brand of prosthetic products whose target audience are athletes. Its function was to promote these products on their social networks. Thanks for visiting my portfolio!

item.title: Editorial design publication
item.description: Editorial design for international scientific publication. The project consisted of making images, tables, layout and the cover design of the writing. Sketches made during the production process. Sample of exported renders to test different architectures and perspectives. Thanks for visiting my portfolio!

item.title: Illustration
item.description: Illustration made for the company E-lixir. This project arises from the need for an image that reflects the work they do in the company, to use them in social networks and web pages. Thanks for visiting my portfolio!

item.title: Motion graphics 3D
item.description: Animated lettering, 3D motion graphics project. Thanks for visiting my portfolio!

item.title: Editorial design magazine
item.description: Editorial design and layout for a local food and ecological agriculture magazine. Thanks for visiting my portfolio!

item.title: Graphic design poster
item.description: Poster design dedicated to blur typography, created in 1992 by the great English designer and typographer Neville Brody. Personal project. Sketches made during the design process. Thanks for visiting my portfolio!
